jcr:content.jcr:title: List of political parties in Burma

contentheadline.headline: List of political parties in Burma

contentrichtext.text: {{Politics of Burma}} This article lists '''[[political party|political parties]] in [[Burma]]'''. Burma is a [[dominant-party state]] with the military-backed [[Union Solidarity and Development Party]] in power. Other parties are legally permitted to exist, but are generally believed to have no realistic chance of winning power. ==Defunct parties== *[[Communist Party of Burma]] (CPB) *[[Democratic Party for a New Society]] (DPNS) *[[Arakan League for Democracy]] (ALD) *[[National Unity Party (Burma)|National Unity Party]] (NUP) *[[Shan Nationalities Democratic Party]] (SNLD) *[[Zomi National Congress]] (ZNC) *[[Parliamentary Democracy Party]] (PDP Burma) *[[Mara People Party]] (MPP) ==Political parties, which registered for [[Burmese general election, 2010|2010 general election]]== {| border=0 cellpadding=2 cellspacing=3 class="wikitable sortable" |- valign="middle" ! Name of Party ! Acronym ! [[Amyotha Hluttaw]] ! [[Pyithu Hluttaw]] !
